release.action: Uploaded source attachments to Maven repository.
Added class JPanelFixture.
Moved ImageException and ScreenshotTaker from package org.fest.swing.util to package org.fest.swing.image.
Renamed org.fest.swing.util.GUITests to org.fest.swing.util.GUITestFinder.
Add timeout for RobotFixture.wait(Condition): RobotFixture.wait(Condition, Timeout).
Added method 'close' to WindowFixture (superclass of FrameFixture and DialogFixture).
Created class JFileChooserFinder.
Added methods 'radioButton' and 'table' to ContainerFixture (superclass of DialogFixture and FrameFixture).
Added static methods 'leftButton', 'middleButton' and 'rightButton' to MouseClickInfo.
Assertion failures in all fixtures now provide better feedback.
Added support for time delays in RobotFixture.
Added method 'pressAndReleaseKeys(int...)', 'pressAndReleaseKey(int)', and 'releaseKey(int)' to all fixtures.
Added method 'rightClick' to all fixtures.
Added method 'doubleClick' to all fixtures.
Added method 'click(MouseButton)' to all fixtures; this method simulates a user clicking the specified mouse button.
Added method 'click(MouseClickInfo)' to all fixtures; this method simulates a user clicking the specified mouse button, the specified number of times.
Added method 'showPopupMenu' to all fixtures. This method shows a pop-up menu on a component and returns a JPopupMenuFixture.
Replaced class JTableFixture.Cell with TableCell.
In JTableFixture, the methods that used to take two int values as the row and column indices as arguments, now take a TableCell as argument.
Added method 'cell(TableCell)' to JTableFixture, which returns a fixture that can manage the specified table cell.
Added support for JPopupMenu, JRadioButton and JSplitPane.
Renamed method 'contents' to 'selectionContents' in JTableFixture.
Removed method testerCastedTo from ComponentFixture.
Added drag 'n drop support for JList, JTable and JTree.
Added support for custom matchers for component lookup. This feature is useful when testing GUI components that don't have an associated name (e.g. testing legacy applications.)
Added utility class Platform, which contains platform-specific utility methods.
ContainerFixture now recognizes JFileChooserFixture and JListFixture.
Support for testing time-consuming tasks
Swing module and the extensions for TestNG and JUnit are included in one zip file.
Now it is possible to embed screenshots of failing GUI tests in JUnit's HTML report.
Added support for more Swing components: JTable, JSpinner, JSlider and JFileChooser.
Separated the TestNG and JUnit extensions (screenshots of failing tests) into their own separate projects.
Added class ScreenLock to guarantee real sequential execution of GUI tests, regardless of the testing framework being used (JUnit or TestNG.)
Added capability to add a screenshot of the desktop to a TestNG HTML test report when a test fails.
Added support for testing JTrees.
Replaced prefix 'should' with 'require' in fixture assertions to make API more concise (e.g. the method 'shouldBeVisible' is now 'requireVisible.')
Renamed method 'shouldHaveThisText' to 'requireText' in interface TextDisplayFixture.
Removed prefix 'find' from methods in ContainerFixture (e.g. the method 'findLabel' is now 'label.')
Added Maven 2 tasks for Ant for dependency management.
Created a Maven 2 pom.xml file for Abbot.
Created a Maven 2 local repository containing all FEST dependencies. This way, it is not necessary to download any dependency from a remote Maven repository when building FEST.
Added module fest-reflect, which provides a 'fluent interface' that simplifies the usage of Java reflection.
